highlights.description: Unified specs/ directory with deployment-driven plugin generation
Single 'assistantkit generate' command replaces separate subcommands

added.description: `Generate()` function for unified deployment-driven plugin generation from specs/
`generatePlatformPlugin()` helper for per-platform complete plugin generation
Main `generate` command now runnable with `--specs`, `--target`, `--output` flags

changed.description: `loadAgents()` now uses `agents.ReadCanonicalDir()` supporting both `.md` and `.json` files
Each deployment target now receives complete plugin (agents, commands, skills, manifest)

documentation.description: Updated README CLI section for unified generate workflow
Updated CLAUDE.md with generate package and CLI workflow sections

highlights.description: Simplified agent generation with 'generate agents' and 'generate all' commands
Markdown command file support with YAML frontmatter

added.description: `generate agents` command for simplified multi-agent-spec workflow
`generate all` command combining plugins and agents generation
Markdown command file support with YAML frontmatter in `commands/core`
Auto-detection of command file format (.md vs .json)
CLI dependency checking with HITL prompts in `requirements`

documentation.description: Added 'generate agents' command documentation to README

highlights.description: Adopt multi-agent-spec SDK as canonical agent model with new powers, skills/kiro, and CLI packages

added.description: `powers` package with canonical Power type and Kiro IDE power generation (POWER.md, mcp.json, steering files)
`skills/kiro` adapter for generating Kiro steering files from canonical skills
Markdown skill format with YAML frontmatter in `skills/core`
`generate` package for programmatic plugin and deployment generation (Claude, Kiro, Gemini)
`cmd/assistantkit` CLI with `generate plugins` and `generate deployment` subcommands
`genagents` CLI: `--skills`/`--skills-output` flags for steering file generation
`genagents` CLI: `--install` flag to copy agents and skills to `~/.kiro/`
Model type constants: `ModelHaiku`, `ModelSonnet`, `ModelOpus`

changed.description: **BREAKING:** `Agent` struct replaced with type alias to `multiagentspec.Agent`; setter methods removed in favor of builder pattern
**BREAKING:** `Agent.Model` field type changed from `string` to `Model` (type alias to `multiagentspec.Model`)
Kiro agent adapter uses actual tool names (`execute_bash`, `fs_read`, `fs_write`) with deduplication

documentation.description: Added CLI reference documentation for `generate plugins` command
Updated README with CLI install and usage sections

tests.description: Updated agent tests for Model type and builder-style API
Updated Kiro adapter tests for new tool names and deduplication

highlights.description: Unified bundle generation package for multi-tool plugin output

added.description: `bundle` package for unified plugin bundle generation across tools (Claude, Kiro, Gemini, Cursor, Codex, VS Code)
`bundle.New()`, `Generate()`, `GenerateAll()` methods for creating and outputting bundles
Consolidated plugin.json format for Claude with embedded MCP servers and hooks
`MCPServerConfig`, `HooksConfig`, `HookEntry`, `Hook` types in `plugins/claude`

changed.description: `ClaudePlugin` now supports embedded `MCPServers` map for consolidated config
`ToCanonical()` and `FromCanonical()` updated to convert MCP servers

documentation.description: Updated Claude marketplace docs with bundle API examples and consolidated format

tests.description: Added unit tests for bundle package (New, AddComponents, Generate, GenerateAll)

highlights.description: Module renamed from aiassistkit to assistantkit

changed.description: Main source file renamed from `aiassistkit.go` to `assistantkit.go`

documentation.description: Added v0.5.0 release notes with migration guide

highlights.description: Migration to agentplexus organization with hooks package for AI assistant lifecycle events

added.description: `hooks` package with adapters for AI assistant lifecycle hooks (Claude, Cursor, Windsurf)
`hooks/core` with canonical hook types, events, and adapter interface
`hooks/claude` adapter for Claude Code hooks (PreToolUse, PostToolUse, etc.)
`hooks/cursor` adapter for Cursor IDE hooks
`hooks/windsurf` adapter for Windsurf hooks

highlights.description: Automated marketplace publishing with GitHub PR creation

added.description: `publish` package for automated plugin submission to AI assistant marketplaces
`publish/claude` adapter for Claude Code marketplace (anthropics/claude-plugins-official)
`publish/github` client wrapper using gogithub for GitHub API operations

dependencies.description: Added `github.com/grokify/gogithub` v0.5.0 for GitHub API utilities

highlights.description: Multi-platform agent generation with new AWS adapters and genagents CLI

added.description: `agents/agentkit` adapter for AWS AgentKit/Agent Builder JSON format
`agents/awsagentcore` adapter for AWS CDK TypeScript code generation
`cmd/genagents` CLI for multi-platform agent generation from canonical specs

documentation.description: Comprehensive MkDocs documentation site with Material theme
Release notes section with v0.1.0 and v0.2.0 notes

infrastructure.description: GitHub Actions workflow for MkDocs gh-pages deployment

highlights.description: Initial release with unified configuration management for AI coding assistants supporting 9 tools

added.description: `mcp` package with adapters for MCP server configurations (Claude, Cursor, Windsurf, VS Code, Codex, Cline, Roo, Kiro)
`context` package with converter for generating CLAUDE.md from CONTEXT.json
`agents` package with adapters for AI assistant agent definitions (Claude, Codex, Gemini, Kiro)
`commands` package with adapters for slash command definitions (Claude, Codex, Gemini)
`plugins` package with adapters for plugin/extension configurations (Claude, Gemini)
`skills` package with adapters for reusable skill definitions (Claude, Codex)
`teams` package for multi-agent team orchestration with process types (sequential, parallel, hierarchical)
`validation` package with configuration validators (Claude, Codex, Gemini)
Adapter pattern with canonical types and tool-specific converters
Self-registering adapters via `init()` for automatic discovery
JSON Schema validation for plugins, commands, skills, agents, teams, and validation configs

documentation.description: ROADMAP.md and ROADMAP.json for project planning
README.md with installation and usage examples
PRESENTATION.md Marp slides for project overview
